<title level="2" right="Creature 0">[Powderkeg Punk Gunner](/NPCs.aspx?ID=1937)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #178: Punks in a Powderkeg](/Sources.aspx?ID=119) pg. 39</row>

**Perception** +4

**Languages**
[Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Goblin](/Languages.aspx?ID=6)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +5, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +2, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +3, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +6, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +5, [Gunpowder Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) +5

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +0

**Dex** +3

**Con** +2

**Int** +1

**Wis** +0

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
[lesser alchemist's fire](/Equipment.aspx?ID=75), [flintlock pistol](/Equipment.aspx?ID=30) (10 rounds), [Leather Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=4), [lesser searing suture](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1548)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +5 

**Ref** +6 

**Will** +2 

</row>

**HP** 13

**Weaknesses**
[fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72) 3

**Blaze of Glory** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32), [emotion](/Traits.aspx?ID=60), [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=68), [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) **Trigger** The Powderkeg Punk takes fire damage; **Effect** The Powderkeg Punk [Demoralize](/Actions.aspx?ID=53) the creature that dealt the fire damage. Demoralize loses the [auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16) trait and gains the [visual](/Traits.aspx?ID=163) trait, and the Powderkeg Punk doesn't take a penalty if the creature doesn't understand their language. The Powderkeg Punk can use this reaction even if the triggering damage reduced the Punk to 0 Hit Points.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +4 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188), [Unarmed](/Traits.aspx?ID=199)),
**Damage** 1d4 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
flintlock pistol +7 ([Concussive](/Traits.aspx?ID=401), [fatal d8](/Traits.aspx?ID=178), [range increment 40 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d4 piercing

**Gut Shot** <actions string="Single Action" />  **Frequency** once per round; **Requirements** The gunner is flanked by two or more creatures and the gunner's pistol is loaded; **Effect** The gunner turns their pistol on themself and pulls the trigger, firing through their own gut to catch the foe behind them unawares. The gunner makes a flintlock pistol Strike against an adjacent creature, who becomes [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) against this Strike. The gunner takes 1d4 piercing damage.

**[Sneak Attack](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=34)**   The gunner deals an additional 1d6 precision damage to [flat-footed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=16) creatures.

**Toss and Shoot** <actions string="Three Actions" />  **Requirements** The gunner is holding a loaded firearm; **Effect** The gunner Interacts to draw an [alchemist's fire](/Equipment.aspx?ID=75), throws it at a point within 30 feet, and then shoots the bomb in midair. Creatures within a 10-foot radius of the shot bomb must succeed at a DC 15 Reflex save or take the [splash](/Traits.aspx?ID=150) and [persistent damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29) from the alchemist's fire.

</column>
name: Powderkeg Punk Gunner
